department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程主要目的在強化博士班同學對教育統計學之知識，並培養同學運用各類統計方法，進行各種量化研究，以回答研究問題。因此，本課程除了統計知識，更著動同學在實務資料分析的養成。課程主題暫訂為平均數檢定、變異數分析、迴歸分析、信度、因素分析及結構方程模式，並視同學研究問題的需要而有所調整。課程進行包含理論講述及資料分析實作(EXCEL、JASP)，以期奠定同學進行量化研究能力。
goal.en: The main objective of this course is to enhance the doctoral students‘ knowledge of educational statistics and to cultivate their ability to apply various statistical methods to conduct quantitative research and answer research questions. Therefore, this course focuses not only on statistical knowledge but also on practical data analysis skills. The course topics include mean comparison tests, analysis of variance (ANOVA), regression analysis, reliability, factor analysis, and structural equation modeling. These topics may be adjusted according to the research needs of the students. The course includes theoretical lectures and practical data analysis sessions (using EXCEL and JASP) to build the students‘ quantitative research capabilities.

outline.ch:
週次日期課程內容
19/11統計學回顧：抽樣分配與區間估計
29/18兩平均數差異檢定
39/25實作：平均數差異檢定 ；單因子變異數分析
410/2單因子變異數分析；二因子變異數分析
510/9重複測量與混合設計
610/16實作：變異數分析
710/23共變、相關與簡單迴歸
810/30多元迴歸、中介與調節效果
911/6實作：相關與迴歸分析
1011/13試題分析、測驗信度
1111/20 (運動會停課)
1211/27效度、因素分析
1312/4實作：試題分析、信度與因素分析
1412/11結構方程模式導論、驗證性因素分析
1512/18模式適配指標
1612/25實作：結構方程模式
171/1(放假)
181/11期末報告繳交
outline.en:
WeekDateCourse Content
19/11Review of Statistics: Sampling Distributions and Interval Estimation
29/18Testing Differences Between Two Means
39/25Practical: Mean Difference Test; One-way ANOVA
410/2One-way ANOVA; Two-way ANOVA
510/9Repeated Measures and Mixed Designs
610/16Practical: Analysis of Variance
710/23Covariance, Correlation, and Simple Regression
810/30Multiple Regression, Mediation, and Moderation Effects
911/6Practical: Correlation and Regression Analysis
1011/13Item Analysis, Test Reliability
1111/20(No class - Sports Day)
1211/27Validity, Factor Analysis
1312/4Practical: Item Analysis, Reliability, and Factor Analysis
1412/11Introduction to Structural Equation Modeling, Confirmatory Factor Analysis
1512/18Model Fit Indices
1612/25Practical: Structural Equation Modeling
171/1(Holiday)
181/11Final Report Submission

textbook.ch: Kline, R. B. (2016). Principles and Practice of Structural Equation Modeling (4th ed.). New York, NY: The Guilford Press.Navarro, D.J., Foxcroft, D.R., ＆ Faulkenberry, T.J. (2019). Learning Statistics with JASP: A Tutorial for Psychology Students and Other Beginners.王文中、錢才瑋 (2012)。統計學與Excel資料分析之實習應用(第六版)。台北：博碩。
textbook.en: Kline, R. B. (2016). Principles and Practice of Structural Equation Modeling (4th ed.). New York, NY: The Guilford Press.Navarro, D.J., Foxcroft, D.R., ＆ Faulkenberry, T.J. (2019). Learning Statistics with JASP: A Tutorial for Psychology Students and Other Beginners.王文中、錢才瑋 (2012)。統計學與Excel資料分析之實習應用(第六版)。台北：博碩。

gradMethod.ch: 1). 課堂參與 30％    2). 回家作業 40％    4). 期末報告 30％
